keywords.indexterm: Connecting to a database (using databaseName attribute)

section.title: Function
section.p: Specifies a database name for a connection; it can be used instead of specifying the database name after the subprotocol.

For example, these URL (and Properties object) combinations are equivalent:
jdbc:derby:toursDB
jdbc:derby:;databaseName=toursDB
jdbc:derby:(with a property databaseName and its value set to toursDB in the Properties object passed into a connection request)

section.p: You can combine this attribute with all other attributes.
